column1: #: description: Inclusive $\Upsilon$(1S) $R_{\rm AA}$ and Pb-Pb yields as a function of transverse momentum. The centrality and rapidity ranges are 0-90% and $2.5<y<4$
column2: respectively. Statistical and systematic uncertainties are reported. A global systematic uncertainty of 2.7% (2.3%) affects all the $R_{\rm AA}$ (yield) values.

column1: #: keyword reactions: Pb Pb --> UPSI(1S) X

column4: Pb Pb --> UPSI(1S) < MU+ MU- > X
